ReceiveThumb

public Bitmap ReceiveThumb(int IssueID,
                           String IssueTPhotoSTR)
Get thumbnail of the issue. If does not exist in the SQLite, then download and store it in the SQLite.

Parameters:
IssueID -
IssueTPhotoSTR - Photo URL
Returns:
the bitmap of the issue thumbnail
